data.title: Project Horseshoe Conference
data.text:
When:

November 5, 2015 to December 31, 1969

About the Event:

When: November 5 - 8, 2015

Where: Comfort, TX

About the conference: Project Horseshoe is a think-tank style conference addressing the industry-wide challenges of modern game design. They work to positively influence the art, science & business of game design over the next five years in ways that are unlikely to happen otherwise, by taking advantage of practice-proven brainstorming methods & access to the brightest minds in the field.

Click here for conference website.
